title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       All three units are open year-round. There are two museums in the monument and both are located in the Sheep Rock unit. There are no visitor centers in the Painted Hills or Clarno units.  Thomas Condon Paleontology Museum 10 a.m. - 5 p.m. Daily  Cant Ranch Historic Home Closed Due to short staffing the Cant Ranch Museum is currently closed.
